name: Veggie Ventures
description:
"Veggie Ventures" is a turn-based tactical game where you take control of the plucky vegetable, Gudrun the Cucumber, as they embark on a journey to save their garden from a horde of pests. Strategize your way through a series of challenging levels, using each Gudrun's abilities to outsmart your enemies and claim victory. With procedurally generated levels and a variety of upgradeable skills, no two playthroughs are ever the same. So what are you waiting for? Join the Veggie Ventures team and save the garden!

Controls

Left Click - Action on node
Space - Finish Turn

Credits

Hendrik - Programming
Milmalissa - Digital Art (3D Models)
manio & ben - Music & Sound Produce

Foreign Assets

Midjourney created the Title Image, Background Images for the Skill Cards and the Unit Icons for the Skeleton and Spider.

UI: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/gui-pro-kit-fantasy-rpg-170168

SFX: Ultimate SFX
